text: Gniewoszów () is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Międzylesie, within Kłodzko County, Lower Silesian Voivodeship, in south- western Poland on Central Sudetes mountain range. Prior to 1945 it used to belong to Germany. It lies approximately north-west of Międzylesie, south of Kłodzko, and south of the regional capital Wrocław. ==References== Category:Villages in Kłodzko County
title: Gniewoszów, Lower Silesian Voivodeship
